title: cannot post on other league board but this one even though im lvl 30
body: cannot post on other league board but this one even though im lvl 30

replies.body: It looks like everyone here is good to go now! :D  An account needs to sync with the boards, especially if it's posting for the first time.  It looks like posting here has fixed up your accounts.  If anyone has further trouble posting, hit me up!

What happened with you?  I'm having the exact same problem, in that my board profile is stuck at level 3.

Edit:  Immediately after posting that my level FINALLY synced.  Apparently to fix it you just have to make a single post anywhere?
totally did ok welp there you have it folks

Oh, wait, even though it says I'm level 30 now I still can't actually post anywhere except for Help and Support.  So still stuck I suppose.
 
Edit:  Ok, all functioning now, apparently it just takes a bit before the boards allow it even after the level sync.
